name: Red Rollin'
description:
Avoid spikes, sacrifice and regain hearts, and help the red ball navigate through to  the tunnel with full health.

For the best experience play in full screen.

A tutorial level is provided in-game, and more levels may be added in the future.

Controls:

  • A/D to Move
  • W to Jump
  • R to Reset Level

Alternate arrow key controls can be used.

This game was made in participation with MFGJ Winter 2022, created by Hiatus.

Note: Initially, this game had followed the jam's theme of, "Nature." Where in - rather than a red ball - you would be a log platforming through an abundance of lush greenery. However, I soon scraped and simplified the idea.
